text: Neufahrn i. NB or Neufahrn in Niederbayern () is a municipality in Landshut in Bavaria in Germany. Its Bavarian name is Neifing. Neufahrn is on the Kleine Laber, a river which flows into the Große Laber and then into the Danube. ==Main sights== *Castle of Neufahrn (14th century) *Church of St. Laurentius (Neobaroque building 1907/1908, old tower 13th century) ==Sons and daughters of Neufahrn== * Hans Meyer (* 1884; † 1966), Philosopher ==References== Category:Landshut (district)
title: Neufahrn in Niederbayern
